projects.name: Exam Portal
projects.description: A MCQ-based software to recruit 2nd year students in the college technical society. Worked with Socket.io to built a leaderboard Separate sides for admin and students for efficient work and management

projects.name: Digital TimeTable
projects.description: A software which automatically generates timetable for all classes and eradicates the use of paperwork. Separate sides for students, teachers and admin for better visualization.

projects.name: Tantum
projects.description: A vehicle sharing website to easily offer a ride or book a ride based on your choice. Implemented chat functionality using Socket.io. Intergrated payment method through Razorpay

experiences.description: Build more than 50% of the software including both frontend and backend. Implemented an Auction Bidding System using Socket.io. Developed collaborative text editing with Tiptap.io, boosting teamwork and productivity.
Built a platform for those who are seeking for job and for those who gives the job.
Worked with the team on more than 10 projects Built website for International Conference for IT Department of college

full_output.name: Raghav Awasthi
achievements_and_awards: Solvd 200+ DSA (Data structure and Algorithm) questions in Leetcode and Codechef.
Achieved Rank of 854 out of 32,000 contestants in Codechef Starters 126 Division 4 (Rated).
Grabbed 1st Rank among 500+ team in Prometeo23, Hackoverflow organized by IIT Jodhpur.
Finalist in hackathon organized by MANIT Bhopal in Feb,2023
Organized Codeshell, a coding competition in all 4 years within the college.
